mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM DIAGNOSIS WHERE USERNAME = #{search};

SELECT D.DANSNUM, D.DOCTORNAME, DU.NAME , A.AGENCYNAME , A.AGENCYTEL, D.DANSREQTIME FROM DIAGNOSIS D LEFT JOIN USERS DU ON D.DOCTORNAME = DU.USERNAME LEFT JOIN MEDIC M ON D.DOCTORNAME = M.USERNAME LEFT JOIN AGENCY A ON M.AGENCYNUM = A.AGENCYNUM WHERE D.USERNAME = #{search} ORDER BY DANSNUM DESC LIMIT #{startRow},#{perPage}

SELECT DU.NAME AS '의사이름', A.AGENCYNAME AS '병원이름', A.AGENCYTEL AS '병원번호', D.DANSREQTIME AS '진료시간', D.DANSCONTENT AS '증상', DF.DANSFILENAME AS '파일명', DF.DANSFILEORINAME AS '원본명' FROM DIAGNOSIS D LEFT JOIN DANSFILE DF ON D.DANSNUM = DF.DANSNUM LEFT JOIN USERS DU ON D.DOCTORNAME = DU.USERNAME LEFT JOIN MEDIC M ON D.DOCTORNAME = M.USERNAME LEFT JOIN AGENCY A ON M.AGENCYNUM = A.AGENCYNUM WHERE D.USERNAME = #{username}
